about.title: About
about.subtitle: Creative innovation company leading Korea-Japan advertising market

content.paragraph1: NEOS Corporation has successfully led the role as a pioneer that directed Japan's advertising market, the nearest neighboring country, to the domestic market within the rapidly changing advertising video market, serving as a bridgehead connecting Korea and Japan. Beyond this, through continuous monitoring and communication, we have reached an influential position in the advertising video production market through close networks and extensive business positioning between Korea and Japan.
content.paragraph2: NEOS Corporation established a management business division in 2010 and launched NEOS Entertainment as a subsidiary in 2013. We provide the best services to advertisers by building quality infrastructure with influential actors and utilizing and integrating new businesses. We are also creating an environment where capable actors can be nurtured, increasing recognition within the industry.
content.paragraph3: In 2018, NEOS Corporation established neostory, a new content business division, through partnerships with leading creators in Japan and Asia in line with the trends of 'Korean Wave' and 'Content'. In 2021, we established NEOSTORY Corporation.
content.paragraph4: We will create content such as internet comics and novels called webtoons and visualize them to collaborate with various people and present them to the world.
content.paragraph5: The NEOS Group will continue to play a leading role in new markets that have never been experienced before.
